Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course

Class Activity

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course.Activity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Course, Event
public abstract class Activity extends Object
This is activity class which will act as the parent class to event and course allowing the creation for an activity in a schedule
Author:
William Krajcovic

    • Activity

      public Activity(String title, String meetingDays, int startTime, int endTime)
      The constructor for the activity class that will be used as the parent class to the course and event classes
      Parameters:
      title - the title of an activity
      meetingDays - the days the activity will take place
      startTime - the start time of the activity
      endTime - the end time of the activity

    • getMeetingDays

      the meetingDays

    • getMeetingString

      public String getMeetingString()
      This method gets the string showing the days of the class, and the start and end time, given in traditional time taken from military time. And returning Arranged if the meeting day is A
      Returns:
      The meeting days, start time, and end time given as a string formatted such as TW 4:00PM - 5:00PM

      Returns:
      the endTime

    • setMeetingDaysAndTime

      public void setMeetingDaysAndTime(String meetingDays, int startTime, int endTime)
      Method that sets the meeting days, start time, and end time for a class. The parameters for this method are that the meeting days use only M, T, W, H, F, A without duplicates for days of weeks and arranged. Start time but be a proper set of military time, and the end time must be less than the start time.
      Parameters:
      meetingDays - meetingDays M, T, W, H, F or A for the days of week or A for arranged
      startTime - the time class will start in military time
      endTime - the time class will end in military time.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the parameters listed above are not followed
